scripts.start: cd src/web && npm run build && cd .. && python main.py
scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others "cd src && python main.py -d" "npm run startWeb"
scripts.buildBin: cd src/web && npm run build && cd .. && python -m eel main.py web/build --onefile --name Bolinho --icon ./web/public/favicon.ico
scripts.installDep: npm install && cd src/web && npm install
